title: Perma banned
body:
Hello, can a Riot person please tell me why this account was banned? I would like to know as I do not got access to the signup email I used for this account.

As of Right now, I've never had a chat restriction on this account, never used a 3rd party program. I've also never said anything really racist or used that sort of hate speech on the game towards another person. Yes I have been toxic a couple games, but never got a chat restriction for it before which is weird.

So just wondering why I am now perma banned and why I never got warnings for anything I might have been doing wrong.

I'm saddened but I think if there was a really good reason to ban me forever and skip the chat restriction process, I'd accept the ban but honestly just don't think there is given what I said above.


Anyhow, thank you to whoever from Riot responds back in advance and tells me what the reform card and issue was because right now, i can't get into my email to check and would love to know.

replies.body:
I did:)

Hopefully I hear back from them. Would like to know, and would hope it's a mistake as Riot never unbans anyone unless it was a mistake. So I'm hoping it was a mistake.

Cause I find it weird to be banned forever if you've never had a chat restriction, never used a 3rd party program, and never said anything extreme racist which I haven't.

Did you get an answer btw? Same problem here for me... Never had a chat restriction, never used a 3rd party program... then out of the blue, permanent banned. The funny thing is I didn't even get an email from them, not even a generic email as I've seen from these posts (youve been banned until feb 2222, 2700 something). I hope this is a sick joke... I guess I'm truly on VACation now lol....

Haven't got an answer from the ticket yet, so will have to wait more than likely. 

But yeah, I know most people say they never been punished or chat restricted and usually lie about that. Well I've never had a restriction in game. 

I've never let anyone use my account or gave my account details away.

I didn't lie about chat restriction... I'm literally in the same shoe as yours. I've NEVER had a chat restriction, nor punished by tribunal.. I don't script, didn't download ANY kind of third party software... I'm so confused

Plus, I've been the only one using this account

They have changed the perm suspension to a two suspension for being toxic/arguing with others. I'll accept it cause I was toxic recently, although I feel the first step should have been chat restrictions which I've never had in game. But anyhow, yeah they responded finally, and now I just gotta wait, come back with a fresh feel, and be happier.
Hey, after reading your post, I looked to my support ticket and got a reply. They said there was a mistake in the system and I got compensated with RP. I'm still wondering what caused the ban though
From what I know a ban wave went out (or was that just EUW?) so there is a small possibility that it was a mistake.
Maybe your account was compromised. Someone else used it or you got hacked. In those cases they permanently ban accounts to prevent futher missuse.
i made a post about a week ago and got a reply on the forums from a riot employee why i was banned. but i still havent gotten my account or gotten a reply from 2 tickets almost 2 weeks old now.
I got same problem here too. LOL, I have no idea wuts going on. Because I never got any warning before, and no email notification after this permaban.
